duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle full service Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, and General Accounting duties.
Maintain vendor records for Audit compliance and handle vendor communications.
Reconcile and post daily lockbox and prepare and post mobile deposits.
Assist in month-end close, cash reconciliation, and financial analysis.
Support Finance Manager with Internal and External Audits.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in accounting, finance, or equivalent required (Master’s preferred)
